title: Sacred games:‘Guru Ka Thoda Zyada Ho Gaya’, That’s What Saif Ali Khan’s Spot Boy Told Him After Watching Sacred Games Season 2
text:
It has been months since Sacred Games season 2 is over and still there are no signs if there will be a season 3. The show ended on a cliff-hanger. Was Sartaj Singh (Saif Ali Khan) was able to save Mumbai from nuclear attack? Everyone has their own theories.

Twitter

Do we need a third season? A lot of the fans who were eagerly waiting for season 2, were a little disappointed after watching the show. Saif Ali Khan has finally acknowledged the criticism Sacred Games season 2 received and he says he isn’t happy with the response. “I am not as happy as I was with response to part 1,” he told Bollywood Hungama in an interview.

TOI

Furthermore, elaborating on what his spot Boy’s review of Sacred Games 2, he said, “I think some people found it a little different and it was always going to be a little different. It is called Sacred Games and it is about a guru going on about things. I have a spot-boy whose opinion I quite value, his name is Hira, and he said who guru ka thoda zyada ho gaya.”

Don't Miss 505 SHARES 297 SHARES 237 SHARES 8.5 K SHARES 12.6 K SHARES

Twitter

About the cliff-hanger, Saif feels it doesn’t make a difference whether Sartaj Singh was able to save his city or not. “I was okay with the ending because it doesn’t make a difference – either it blows up or he saves it. I quite like the show,” he said.

Do you want Sacred Games season 3? Let us know what you feel in the comments section below.
description: Saif Ali Khan said his spotboy felt ‘Guru Ka Thoda Zyada Ho Gaya’ in Sacred Games season 2. t has been months since Sacred Games season 2 is over and still there are no signs if there will be a season 3. The show ended on a cliff-hanger. Was Sartaj Singh (Saif Ali Khan) was able to save Mumbai from nuclear attack? Everyone has their own theories.
